install.name: Content - ITPSubscribe
install.author: Todor Iliev
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Todor Iliev ( ITPrism.com ). All rights reserved.
install.description:
ITPSubscribe is a plugin that adds FeedBurner form in your articles. It will help you to increase count of your subscribers.

Invest in the extension improvement and sponsor it via SMS or PayPal.

Please, vote for the extension on Joomla! Extensions Directory

param.name: showInArticles
param.label: Show In Articles
param.description: Display RSS form in the view 'article'.

param.name: showInCategories
param.label: Show In Categories
param.description: Display RSS form in the view 'category'.

param.name: showInSections
param.label: Show In Sections
param.description: Display RSS form in the view 'section'.

param.name: showInFrontPage
param.label: Show In FrontPage
param.description: Display RSS form in the view 'frontpage'.

param.name: position
param.label: Position
param.description: A position where you want to put the form.

param.name: excludeSections
param.label: Exclude sections
param.description: List with excluded sections divided by comma. Enter sections IDs.

param.name: excludeCats
param.label: Exclude categories
param.description: List with excluded categories divided by comma. Enter categories IDs.

param.name: excludeArticles
param.label: Exclude articles
param.description: List of excluded articles divided by comma. Enter article IDs.

param.name: includeArticles
param.label: Display in articles
param.description: Displays RSS form in these articles notwithstanding the exclusion settings. Enter articles IDs.

param.name: bg
param.label: Background
param.description: The background of the div element.

param.name: top
param.label: Top position
param.description: A top position of the RSS icon.

param.name: left
param.label: Left position
param.description: A left position of the RSS icon.

param.name: displayFeedburner
param.label: Display FeedBurner Form
param.description: Select 'Yes' if you want to display the FeedBurner form.

param.name: feedburner_uri
param.label: FeedBurner URI
param.description: Set your feedburner uri string ( last part of the url ). For example : http://feeds.feedburner.com/itprism - The uri is 'itprism'.

field.name: displayCustomForm
field.label: Display Custom Form
field.description: Select 'Yes' if you want to display the custom form.

field.name: customHtmlFormCode
field.label: HTML code
field.description: Put the HTML code of the additional form, and it will be displyed.
